snippet: The Pegatron Corporation, which makes iPhones and iPads, acknowledged the recent deaths of young workers, but said it wasn’t because of poor conditions.
abstract: Pegatron Corporation, Taiwanese manufacturer of Apple's iPhones and iPads, acknowledges recent deaths of young workers, but says it is not because of poor conditions at its Shanghai plant; labor rights activists say workers from Pegatron have complained about long working hours and harsh working conditions.
lead_paragraph: The Pegatron Corporation, which makes iPhones and iPads, acknowledged the recent deaths of young workers, but said it wasn’t because of poor conditions.

headline.main: Worker Deaths Raise Questions at an Apple Contractor in China
headline.print_headline: Deaths Raise Concerns at Apple Contractor
